page.title: 19LATCHINGDON COLTS
page.content: Latchingdon has 4 football teams, under 9's,under 11's, under 12's, and the senior team.Ross and I play for the under 11's.Our positions are Ross is centre foward and I am right wing. We train at Latchingdon playing field every Wednesday.We have a sponsor called Maldon Fencing, they buy us tracksuits and new kits when we need them and they get their name on our shirts. The team is called Latchingdon Juniors. Each year we get trophies. The trophies we get are Best Player, Players Player, Best Improved, Sportsman of the Year and the Brett Lakkides Shield. The shield is for Brett Lakkides who used to play in goal for us but in 1985 he died during a heart operation so we have a shield to commemorate him.Often we have discos and jumble sales to raise funds for the club.
